Container.Name: ComiXed
Container.Overview:
ComiXed is a digital comic library management tool. Its underlying goal is to enable users to manage the contents of their library and to access that library from any device that supports OPDS. (Exert from comixed Wiki. Accessed 08.11.2021 (https://github.com/comixed/comixed/wiki))
Read this! Readme: https://github.com/comixed/comixed/blob/master/README.md Quickstart: https://github.com/comixed/comixed/blob/master/QUICKSTART.md
After container start wait a bit, as it has a bit of Overhead. Default accounts are to be found in the Quickstart entry.
Access to opds: [ServerIP]:[DockerPort]/opds

Config.Name: Library
Config.Description: This is where your books will be stored.

Config.Name: Database
Config.Description: Here the Database which Comixed uses will be saved.

Config.Name: Incoming
Config.Description: Put files here to import them to the library.
